channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 2nd Gen AMD EPYC™ Processors

item.title: CVE-2021-26345|2024-06-18T18:38:22.990Z -- amd -- 2nd%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2%20processors
item.description: Failure to validate the value in APCB may allow a privileged attacker to tamper with the APCB token to force an out-of-bounds memory read potentially resulting in a denial of service.
